properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 31 at 6:19PM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
This is a special weather statement from the National Weather
Service Office in Riverton.

* WHAT...A Southwest wind 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 55 mph.
Isolated gusts around 60 mph are possible.

* WHERE...Beaver Rim to Jeffrey City to Muddy Gap.

* WHEN...Now through New Year's Day.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel will be difficult, especially for
high profile vehicles. Strong cross winds will enhance the
blowover risk for lightweight and high profile vehicles,
including camping trailers. Some blowing snow is possible.

NWSheadline: Strong Gusty Winds through New Year's Day
